column1: Uchi////The service is in keeping with nouveau-hip service rules of saying "hey how's it going" to me like me and the servers are friends. We're not. I'm not a fan
column2: but I can roll with it. It took way to long too get wine refilled. The stars do not reflect any of the service stuff
column3: but now that I think about it maybe they source their talent from Whole Foods too.
